sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import styles from "./Cart.module.css" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Header from '../Header/Header' import Footer from '../Footer/Footer' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import DeleteIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Delete'; import { removeItem } from '../../redux/features/products' function Cart() { const navigate = useNavigate() const [isDeleteClicked, setIsDeleteClicked] = useState(false); const cartItems = useSelector((state) => state.products.value) const [totalAmount, setTotalAmount] = useState(() => { let s = 0 for (let i = 0; i < cartItems.length; i++) { s += cartItems[i].price } return s }) const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleRemoveItemFromCart = (product) => { dispatch(removeItem(product)) isDeleteClicked(true) } return (

Checkout

Total Items: {cartItems.length}

{cartItems.map((cartItem, index) => (
navigate('/product', { state: cartItem })} key={index} id={styles.boxContainer}>

{cartItem.productName}

Amount: {cartItem.price} DNT

handleRemoveItemFromCart(cartItem)} color='error' style={{ position: "absolute", bottom: 10, right: 10, }} />
))}

Total Amount

Amount: {totalAmount} DNT

) } export default Cart
